name: AX2012ModelstoreDrop
description: Drops the schema of an AX 2012 model store
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Server config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the server configuration file.

inputs.name: schemaName
inputs.label: Schema name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Removes the specified schema from the model store in the Microsoft Dynamics AX database.

inputs.name: symbolsMaximumWaitTime
inputs.label: Max wait time (min)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of minutes to wait before failing the step

instanceNameFormat: SDK4NET.de - AX 2012 Model Store - Drop Schema: $(schemaName)
